recommendations: Tarun Rattan
Technology Manager
December 10, 2012, Raghavendra Prasad worked with Tarun in the same group

I worked with Raghav on the challenging assignment at AIB Bank, Dublin. After he joined that project, he provided the much needed stability in the analysis work being done on the interfaces space which was almost in total disarray before him. He was the only one to understand the full landscape of online and batch interfaces and helped defined  the overall technical architecture for the program which encompassed around 250 online and batch interfaces with the core banking engine. His write up on the requirement specifications for the replacement of the main online accounting engine is still considered a gospel within AIB. Raghav successfully led the technical team consisting of technical analysts from Accenture, AIB and i-Flex as well as freelancers with 20+ years experience in core banking transformation.I would recommend Raghav for any project assignment which needs a strong technical architect, proven leadership skills and diverse background in program management as well as organisational transformation.

November 13, 2014, Raghavendra Prasad managed Sarang directly

Sarang is a well rounded Program Manager with excellent Management skills, Sound Technical knowledge and Strong Soft Skills.  Sarang is very conscientious and has a very strong work ethic. summary: IT Executive with over 20 years of experience in engineering leadership roles building large scale systems in the financial services industry.  I am a self-driven leader with a passion to do the right thing in serving the needs of clients, the firm and its employees.  I  have a proven track record, as a  transformational leader, in converting a vision into reality and sustaining it, by applying industry knowledge, strategic thought leadership and providing innovative technology solutions.I am a credible change agent with track record of transforming technology, people, and processes to enable increased business value, enhanced client experience, and an assuring future.  Developed and Lead high-performing teams of over 200 employees and managed portfolios  of $ 20+ Million.
